titleStmt.title: The Scotch lad's moan. Or, Pretty Moggies unkindness. To an excellent new Scotch tune. This may be printed, R.P.
titleStmt.author: D'Urfey, Thomas, 1653-1723.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby at the Gold[e]n ball in Py-corner.,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "A lad o'th' town that made his moan ..."
Date and place of publication suggested by Wing.
Item at A5:2[324] imperfect: trimmed, affecting imprint.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University, Houghton Library and the British Library.
